product_name: Repel Sportmens Max Insect Repellent - 40 Percent Deet - 4 fl. oz.
long_description: Repel Sportsmen Max Formula(TM) lotion keeps biting insects away so you can enjoy your time in the great outdoors. Formula is 40% DEET for up to 10 hrs. of effective protection. Great for use against mosquitoes, ticks, biting flies, gnats, chiggers and fleas.
short_description: Repel Sportsmen Max Formula(TM) lotion keeps biting insects away so you can enjoy your time in the great outdoors.
